Dropout¶

Layer architecture¶

class nnlibs.dropout.models.Dropout(keep_prob=0.5)[source]¶

Bases: nnlibs.commons.models.Layer

Definition of a dropout layer prototype.

Parameters

keep_prob (float) – Probability to keep active one unit from previous layer.

compute_shapes(A)[source]¶

Wrapper for nnlibs.dropout.parameters.dropout_compute_shapes().

def dropout_compute_shapes(layer, A):
    """Compute forward shapes and dimensions for layer.
    """
    X = A    # Input of current layer of shape (m .. n)

    layer.fs['X'] = layer.fs['D'] = X.shape

    layer.d['m'] = layer.fs['X'][0]        #
    layer.d['n'] = X.size // layer.d['m']  #

    return None
forward(A)[source]¶

Wrapper for nnlibs.dropout.forward.dropout_forward().

def dropout_forward(layer, A):
    """Forward propagate signal to next layer.
    """
    # (1) Initialize cache
    X = initialize_forward(layer, A)


    D = layer.np_rng.standard_normal(layer.fs['D'])

    D = layer.fc['D'] = (D < layer.d['k'])

    A = X * D

    A = A / layer.d['k']

    A = layer.fc['A'] = A

    return A    # To next layer
backward(dA)[source]¶

Wrapper for nnlibs.dropout.backward.dropout_backward().

def dropout_backward(layer, dA):
    """Backward propagate signal to previous layer.
    """
    dX = initialize_backward(layer, dA)

    dA = dX * layer.fc['D']

    dA /= layer.d['k']

    dA = layer.bc['dA'] = dA

    return dA    # To previous layer
compute_gradients()[source]¶

Wrapper for nnlibs.dropout.parameters.dropout_compute_gradients().

def dropout_compute_gradients(layer):
    """Compute gradients with respect to weight and bias for layer.
    """
    # No gradients to update for Dropout layer

    return None
